references.reason: This paper is considered among the most important because it introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), which are foundational to the work presented in the RayFlow paper.

references.paper_title: Generative modeling by estimating gradients of the data distribution
references.reason: This paper is considered among the most important because it is a crucial reference regarding generative modeling.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is considered among the most important because it introduces Latent Diffusion Models which many text-to-image models (including those used by RayFlow) are based upon.

references.paper_title: Flow straight and fast: Learning to generate and transfer data with rectified flow
references.reason: This paper is considered among the most important because it introduces rectified flows which are relevant to the RayFlow paper.

references.paper_title: Rectified flow: A marginal preserving approach to optimal transport
references.reason: This paper is considered among the most important because it introduces rectified flows which are relevant to the RayFlow paper.
